statements: DELETE FROM experimental_results WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM experimental_results WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe' AND experiment_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM experimental_results WHERE experiment_name = 'Test Experiment';
DELETE FROM experimental_results WHERE experiment_id = 101 AND start_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM experimental_results WHERE end_time < NOW();
DELETE FROM lab_technicians WHERE technician_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM laboratories WHERE lab_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM experimenters WHERE department = 'Chemistry' AND job_title = 'Researcher';
DELETE FROM lab_equipment WHERE location = 'Lab A' AND quantity < 5;
